info.author: Festum Qin
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
JJSON
=======================

jQuery selector liked JSON query tool

- `Source <https://github.com/festum/jjson>`_


Example Usage
-------------

.. code-block:: python

	import jjson

	# Get string from nested JSON
	j = {
		"foo": {
			"bar": {
				"test": "hello world"
			}
		}
	}
	p = "foo.bar.test"
	print jjson.extract(j, p)
	# hello world


Install
-------

The latest stable version can always be installed or updated via pip:

.. code-block:: bash

	$ pip install git+https://github.com/festum/jjson.git

	# Alternative
	$ pip install jjson

info.name: jjson
info.summary: A library of useful functions to get value from nested JSON
info.html_description:
jQuery selector liked JSON query tool

  • Source

Example Usage

import jjson

# Get string from nested JSON
j = {
        "foo": {
                "bar": {
                        "test": "hello world"
                }
        }
}
p = "foo.bar.test"
print jjson.extract(j, p)
# hello world

Install

The latest stable version can always be installed or updated via pip:

$ pip install git+https://github.com/festum/jjson.git

# Alternative
$ pip install jjson
